name: The State of Mind
description:
You have been isekaied to another world. Everybody lives in peace and happiness. Until you find out that the people are going to revolt. You got right into a big conspiracy. But why is everyone naked?

Can you save and free the citizens of Melrichstadt?

  • You will learn about forbidden magic and summons.
  • The game is a realistic psycho thriller.
  • There are lots of nude bodies, but no sex in this game.
  • Play the game to find out why most people are naked.
  • Mind blowing plot
  • What happened to real money in this world
  • Who is the Royal Guard and why is the society divided
  • Short and sweet, around 1 hour with replay value
  • Two different endings
  • Daily routine like Persona (but light version)
  • Make the right decisions
